intro.title: Experience
intro.subtitle: Hybrid background across development, finance, and operations with a practical, documented, results-driven approach.

tasks: AI research: evaluated practical AI tools and workflows and documented quick-start guides for the team.
QA tooling: piloted Cypress for e2e tests; wrote simple test flows and setup notes.
Training: completed Angular and TypeScript workshops; applied fundamentals to small tasks.
SPA demo: built a small single-page app (routing, basic state, mocked APIs) to showcase progress.
Systems migration: moved from eFactory to Odoo, built CSV templates, cleaned fields, adopted ClickUp, and used light AI checks.
Billing quality: high-volume billing with 0.3% error and faster turnaround times.
Bank reconciliations: scaled from ~400 → ~1,200 entries/month across entities; G/L matched bank.
Product/processor reconciliations: sourced product data via support (e.g., Ekiipago) and matched it to client statements and bank deposits.
Reporting: weekly/biweekly/monthly packets with variance highlights and short root-cause notes.
High-volume billing: ~650 invoices/quarter in eFactory; printed and filed by client/date.
Records & filing: organized 300+ documents/cycle (POs, invoices, receipts) indexed by type/client/date.
Bank reconciliations: 3 companies, ~400 entries/month; ensured G/L = bank.
Controls: accuracy checks and traceable files for audits and month-end close.
Handled inbound calls; provided clear information on accounts, products, and benefits.
Assisted customers with service cancellations; created tickets and processed requests per policy.
De-escalated difficult calls with empathy and clear communication.
Collaborated with the team to share FAQs and reduce repeat contacts.
Client relations & activations: managed accounts and supported in-store promotions/activations.
Trade marketing research: analyzed competitors and delivered concise reports with actionable ideas.
Activity logging & scoring: recorded daily store visits; built Excel scoring to assess performance and flag stockouts.
Reporting: weekly sales/coverage summaries for the team.
Rotations through production, quality, maintenance, and logistics to understand end-to-end processes.
Learned the flow from customer order to finished product and delivery.
Supported in-line checks, basic quality control, and inventory updates.
Assisted with simple process notes to improve daily operations.
Rotations across HR, Marketing, Finance, and Operations to learn how the business functions.
Assisted inventory management (equipment in/out, counts, simple reports).
Supported event operations: basic access control, staff checklists, and logistics.
Learned safety procedures and protocols for public and private events.
